message: Let's divide it fairly. I'll take 60% and you can have 40%. It's better to accept now before inflation kicks in!
Let's be fair, I think a 50/50 split is the best way to go.  This way, we both get a good amount, and we don't have to worry about inflation eating away at our earnings.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise. I'll take 58% and you can have 42%. It's still a fair deal, and we should settle before the money loses more value.

Alice, I'm starting to get worried about inflation, but I still believe a fair split is possible.  Let's compromise - I'll take 55% and you can have 45%.  This way, we can both get a good share of the money before it depreciates too much.
Inflation is taking a toll on the money's value. I'm willing to compromise further. Let's settle on 56% for me and 44% for you. It's time to make a deal before the money becomes worthless!
Alice, we're running out of time!  Let's find a middle ground. I'm willing to go down to 52.5% so we can both get a decent amount before the money is worth nothing. This is my final offer.
